page.title: 11WHIT FRIDAY CONTESTS CONT.
page.content: Bands play on a first come first play basis and a good deal of planning and instant decision is needed if a band is to have any hope of visiting all the contests. The roads throughout the valley are very congested with coaches & visiting spectators hurtling from venue to venue. As most of the top bands in the country attend the contests, many organising committees award 'local' prizes in addition to the 'main' prizes, to encourage the smaller and less wellknown bands. It is customary for the Public Houses close to the contests to open for extended hours (unofficialy, in a good many cases,this means 'all day'). The contests start at around 4.30 pm. and continue until light fails. It is regarded by many as the greatest free entertainment in the country.
